name: square tombstone
look_description: You try to read the writing on the square tombstone, but it is so old and dilapidated that you find you can’t make out a single thing. The square tombstone has obviously been here much longer than the oval tombstone. Best to leave it be.

read.text: You try to read the writing on the Square Tombstone, but it is so old and dilapidated that you find you can’t make out a single thing. This grave has obviously been here much longer. Best to leave it be.
